effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

short_effect.black_white: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavor_text.black_white: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
